title: France panorama. [No. 72/16]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Flashes: The World Ski Cup - the last ski meet of the 1972 season. The world’s prettiest insects - the collections of Paris’ Museum of Natural History. Urbanism - a new experiment in development planning in the Paris suburb of Ivry. 2. Dam planning - study of hydraulic developments on small scale models in Grenoble. 3. Hit parade - a song by new pop song star Dani. 4. Swiss art in Paris - a contemporary Swiss art show at the Grand Palais.
